entries.text: [Update] Added support for Google Drive and YouTube video links
[Update] Made some layout improvements to the portfolio site
[Event] Gave a speech for AI WAVE Opening Ceramony at TWTC
[Research] PATCH has been submitted to ACL ARR July cycle after extensive revisions
[Achievement] Participated in the AIGO program's one-day hackathon at NTU, won first prize
[Achievement] PATCH won first prize in school's research competition
[Achievement] Won championship at Fushing Debate Open 2025 thanks to my amazing team!
[Award] Excited to announce that I have been awarded the Harvard Prize Book!
[Project] Kicked off the FORTRESS project, a RAG-inspired defense system
[Research] PATCH has been submitted to ACL ARR May cycle
